scripts.gh-pages:_data: for x in package.json tags.json; do npm run gh-pages:_data:$x; done
scripts.gh-pages:push: git subtree --prefix gh-pages push origin gh-pages
scripts.gh-pages:pull: git subtree --prefix gh-pages pull origin gh-pages
scripts.jekyll: npm run gh-pages:_data; cd gh-pages; jekyll build; cd ..
scripts.postversion: git push origin v${npm_package_version}; npm publish; npm run push
scripts.postpublish: npm run gh-pages:_data; git commit -am ':arrow_up: updated version'; npm run push
scripts.postupdate-deps: npm test && git commit -am ':arrow_up: updated deps' || git checkout -- package.json
scripts.push: git push origin master; npm run gh-pages
